requests.response_body: {"indicators":[{"indicator_id":1,"indicator_group":"Deforestation","description":"Tree cover loss per year ({{years}}) at {{threshold}} threshold in units of hectares","value_units":"hectares"},{"indicator_id":2,"indicator_group":"Deforestation","description":"Tree cover loss per year ({{years}}) at {{threshold}} threshold in units of % of initial tree cover extent (TreeCov_UMD_2000) at the same threshold","value_units":"hectares"},{"indicator_id":3,"indicator_group":"Treecover Extent","description":"Tree cover extent according to UMD data at {{threshold}} threshold for the year 2000 in units of hectares","value_units":"hectares"},{"indicator_id":4,"indicator_group":"Stocks in 2000","description":"Aboveground biomass stocks according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year 2000","value_units":"Tg"},{"indicator_id":5,"indicator_group":"Stocks in 2000","description":"Aboveground carbon stocks according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year 2000","value_units":"Tg"},{"indicator_id":6,"indicator_group":"Stocks in 2000","description":"Belowground biomass stocks according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year 2000","value_units":"Tg"},{"indicator_id":7,"indicator_group":"Stocks in 2000","description":"Belowground carbon stocks according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year 2000","value_units":"Tg"},{"indicator_id":8,"indicator_group":"Stocks in 2000","description":"Total (above + belowground) biomass stocks according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year 2000","value_units":"Tg"},{"indicator_id":9,"indicator_group":"Stocks in 2000","description":"Total (above + belowground) carbon stocks according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year 2000","value_units":"Tg"},{"indicator_id":10,"indicator_group":"Aboveground Density","description":"Aboveground live biomass density according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year 2000","value_units":"Mg Biomass/ha"},{"indicator_id":11,"indicator_group":"Aboveground Density","description":"Aboveground carbon density in live biomass according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year 2000","value_units":"Mg Carbon/ha"},{"indicator_id":12,"indicator_group":"Carbon Emissions","description":"Aboveground biomass loss according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year ({{year}}) in units of Tg biomass","value_units":"Tg biomass"},{"indicator_id":13,"indicator_group":"Carbon Emissions","description":"Aboveground biomass loss according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year ({{year}}) in units of Tg biomass","value_units":"TgC"},{"indicator_id":14,"indicator_group":"Carbon Emissions","description":"Carbon emissions from aboveground biomass loss according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year ({{year}}) in units of Mt CO2","value_units":"MtC02"}]}
requests.curl:
curl "http://gfwc-staging.herokuapp.com/api/indicators" -X GET \
	-H "Accept: application/json; application/gfwc-v1+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
	-H "Host: gfwc-staging.herokuapp.com" \
	-H "Cookie: "
